issue.title: [R] Add basic Expression class
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6986](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6986). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I started this as part of ARROW-6980 but it proved not necessary. This will be a foundation for ARROW-6982, in addition to being useful on its own.

comments.body:
